comments.body: Does this govern scaling upwards only? What about downwards?

Will update the proposal with info from https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pull/2863#issuecomment-66939472

Allowing the user to define the comparison and scale increment will allow them to scale up or down with a single `ShouldScale` interface by passing the scale increment to the `resize` endpoint (negative values account for the scale down scenario).

A lot of the code lines overflow off the right side of the text box when I view the .md file, with no horizontal scrollbar at the bottom (so it's just not possible to see the overflow text). If this is how it will look when it is viewed after being merged, I'd suggest breaking up these lines. The way I am viewing the .md file is go to "files changed" in the PR and click "View"
